[[File:Tolkien_Grave_at_Wolvercote.jpg: '''Wolvercote Cemetery''' is a municipal cemetery in north [[Oxford]]. It is the final resting place of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. He was buried with his wife, [[Edith Tolkien
Edith and J.R.R. Tolkien's grave.]]: John Tolkien's]] grave is not far away from his parents' grave. Also, [[Humphrey Carpenter]] is buried in Wolvercote Cemetery.
